casebody.data:
[Cheshire,

June, 1885.] Kendrick, Adm'r, v. Pierce. Assumpsit, for money paid by a surety of tbe defendant. Judgment was ordered for tbe plaintiff, and a bill of exceptions was allowed. E. M. Forbes and Batchelder Sf Faulkner, for the plaintiff. H. W. Brigham and Haskins Sf Stoddard, for the defendant. Doe, C. J.

It is not claimed by either party that the bill of exceptions raises any question of law.

Exceptions overruled.

Blodgett, J., did not sit: the others concurred.
